name: Viral music videos
description: Gotye's 'Somebody that I used to know' was one of the internet's most viral music videos, seconded only to Queen Bey's 'Singles Ladies'.

key_work.title: Somebody that I used to know – Gotye ft. Kimbra
key_work.brief_description: One of the first music videos to go viral in the age of the internet, ‘Somebody That I Used to Know’ (2011) by Gotye (and featuring Kimbra) has been viewed over 1.3 billion times on YouTube.

constellations_primary.name: Viral music videos

end.title: Somebodies: A YouTube Orchestra
end.brief_description: A mash-up of parodies, homages and covers of Gotye’s iconic 2011 track, ‘Somebody That I Used to Know’.

constellations_other.name: Viral music videos
constellations_other.description: Gotye's 'Somebody that I used to know' was one of the internet's most viral music videos, seconded only to Queen Bey's 'Singles Ladies'.

links.description: Gotye’s global chart-topper swept the airways, award shows and YouTube when it was released in 2011. It’s catchy tune, stop-motion animation video and heartfelt lyrics made it a phenomenon, spawning hundreds of online covers, captured by Gotye in the mash-up, ‘Somebodies: A YouTube Orchestra’.

end.title: Somebody That I Used to Know - Walk off the Earth

video_links.name: Somebody That I Used to Know - Walk off the Earth

end.brief_description: Walk off the Earth performs a cover of Gotye’s ‘Somebody That I Used to Know’ using five people on one guitar.

constellations_other.name: Viral music videos
constellations_other.description: Gotye's 'Somebody that I used to know' was one of the internet's most viral music videos, seconded only to Queen Bey's 'Singles Ladies'.

links.description: One of the first parodies in a long list of homages, remixes and covers was Walk Off the Earth’s version featuring five people playing the song on one guitar. While it hasn’t had as many views at the original, the 188 million it’s achieved isn’t bad.

end.title: Glee
end.creator_credit: Bradley Buecker, 20th Century Fox Television, Brad Falchuk Teley-vision and Ryan Murphy Productions
end.brief_description: In this musical comedy, optimistic high school teacher Will Schuester tries to refuel his own passion while reinventing the high school’s glee club and challenging a group of outcasts to realize their star potential as they strive to outshine their singing competition while navigating the cruel halls of McKinley High.

constellations_other.name: Viral music videos
constellations_other.description: Gotye's 'Somebody that I used to know' was one of the internet's most viral music videos, seconded only to Queen Bey's 'Singles Ladies'.

links.description: It wasn’t just amateur musicians who saw the potential of ‘Somebody that I used to know’, with the song (like many hits) reinterpreted and performed inTV musical Glee. Rather than represent a dissolving relationship, in Glee it expressed the estrangement between two brothers.

constellations_other.name: Viral music videos
constellations_other.description: Gotye's 'Somebody that I used to know' was one of the internet's most viral music videos, seconded only to Queen Bey's 'Singles Ladies'.

links.description: In 2014, ACMI presented Spectacle: The Music Video Exhibition, which featured ‘Somebodies’ as an example of a song that was adopted by the internet through parodies and covers to become a pop cultural phenomenon. In the same section were parodies inspired by Beyonce’s ‘Single Ladies’.

end.brief_description: In this musical comedy, optimistic high school teacher Will Schuester tries to refuel his own passion while reinventing the high school’s glee club and challenging a group of outcasts to realize their star potential as they strive to outshine their singing competition while navigating the cruel halls of McKinley High.

constellations_other.name: Viral music videos
constellations_other.description: Gotye's 'Somebody that I used to know' was one of the internet's most viral music videos, seconded only to Queen Bey's 'Singles Ladies'.

links.description: Of course, the song’s pop cultural cache and immense popularity meant that it was performed on Glee, not once but twice.

end.title: The Ed Sullivan Show
end.creator_credit: Bob Precht, Chester Feldman and Susan F. Walker
end.brief_description: The Ed Sullivan Show is an American TV variety show that originally ran on CBS from Sunday June 20, 1948 to Sunday June 6, 1971, and was hosted by New York entertainment columnist Ed Sullivan.

constellations_other.name: Viral music videos
constellations_other.description: Gotye's 'Somebody that I used to know' was one of the internet's most viral music videos, seconded only to Queen Bey's 'Singles Ladies'.

links.description: Even Beyonce has her inspirations. The iconic dance routine for ‘Singles Ladies’, which Beyonce worked on with Frank Gatson Jr, was inspired by a routine choreographed by Broadway legend Bob Fosse on The Ed Sullivan Show called ‘Mexican Breakfast’.

start.title: The Ed Sullivan Show

start.brief_description: The Ed Sullivan Show is an American TV variety show that originally ran on CBS from Sunday June 20, 1948 to Sunday June 6, 1971, and was hosted by New York entertainment columnist Ed Sullivan.

end.title: Fosse/Verdon
end.creator_credit: Adam Bernstein, Jessica Yu, Minkie Spiro, 5000 Broadway Productions, Fox 21 Television Studios, FX Productions, Joel Fields Productions, Old 320 Sycamore, Pyrrhic Victory Productions, The VerdonFosse Legacy and West Egg Studios
end.brief_description: Spanning five decades, FOSSE/VERDON explores the singular romantic and creative partnership between Bob Fosse and Gwen Verdon

constellations_other.name: Viral music videos
constellations_other.description: Gotye's 'Somebody that I used to know' was one of the internet's most viral music videos, seconded only to Queen Bey's 'Singles Ladies'.

links.description: One of the three dancers in the ‘Mexican Breakfast’ routine is Gwen Verdon, Fosse’s wife. In the miniseries Fosse/Verdon, the couple are played by Sam Rockwell and Michelle Williams.

end.title: God Told Me To

video_links.name: God Told Me To music video

end.brief_description: A music video directed by Natasha Pincus for Paul Kelly’s “God Told Me To”.

constellations_other.name: Viral music videos
constellations_other.description: Gotye's 'Somebody that I used to know' was one of the internet's most viral music videos, seconded only to Queen Bey's 'Singles Ladies'.

links.description: Natasha Pincus not only directed ‘Somebody that I used to know’ and oversaw its iconic stop-motion animation, she got her start directing another Australian music legend – Paul Kelly – for his song ‘God Told Me To’, which saw shot on 35mm film.
